name: 11 Challenges: Get the Biggest Multiples of 11
name_original: 11 Challenges: Get the Biggest Multiples of 11
description:
11 challenges: Get the biggest multiples of 11 – A creative number puzzle game is coming to you! Do you think you’re a number talent? Now it’s a good chance to test yourself!

You need to combine numbers like 1-10 to add up to 11, and then combine the same 11s or multiples of 11. Seems easy, but actually, it’s hard to score high. Luckily, the Undo button is unlimited to help you when there are no available moves. What’s more, we have smart Hint and Rearrange button to break the deadlock amazingly!

How To Play:
First, combine numbers like 1-10 to add up to 11.
1+10=11
2+4+5=11
4+2+1+4=11
3+1+1+1+5=11
…
Second, combine the same 11s or multiples of 11.
11+11=22
22+22=44
44+44=88
88+88=176
…
See how large a number you can get!
